thread.title: Oil Can Henry's Supporting Military Families
thread.title_full: Oil Can Henry's Supporting Military Families - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Oil Can Henry's Supporting Military Families
text:
Oil Can Henry’s
Company will donate $1.00 for each vehicle serviced in October to Support Military Families
TUALATIN, Ore. , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Oil Can Henry's , the trusted provider of oil changes and other preventive vehicle maintenance, today announced the return of its "Be a Star to Military Families" campaign, a company-wide initiative to benefit the National Military Family Association (NMFA).
All Oil Can Henry's service centers will donate $1.00 for each vehicle they service October 1-31, 2015 , to the NMFA. They're also donating $1.00 for each new follower on the Oil Can Henry's Instagram, Twitter and Facebook during the month of October, up to $5,000 .
"Our nation's military and their families make big sacrifices to ensure our freedoms and safety," said Chris Shepanek , Chief Executive Officer of Oil Can Henry's. "Oil Can Henry's is proud to honor and support them by making a donation to the National Military Family Association for each vehicle serviced in October. Our local owner/operators are committed to the communities we serve and are excited by this opportunity to help provide counseling, education, camps and other programs that strengthen and protect our nation's military families."
Oil Can Henry's raised $71,000 last October with it's inaugural "Be a Star to Military Families" campaign, Shepanek noted, and hopes to significantly exceed that number this year. All of the funds Oil Can Henry's donates to the NMFA will be used to support all military branches' service members and their families in the six states Oil Can Henry's serves.
"We're excited to work with Oil Can Henry's and their local center owners again this year," said Joyce Wessel Raezer , NMFA Executive Director. "Their donation will help us provide critically-needed programs and resources to ensure that our nation's military families receive the support they deserve."
NMFA is the leading non-profit dedicated to improving the lives of military families. NMFA's exceptional Operation Purple® Program includes children and family programs that help military families through each stage of military deployment. Their scholarship program helps prepare military spouses for meaningful employment by helping fund degrees, licensure and certifications.
Oil Can Henry's is also offering a special 15% discount on oil changes and other preventive maintenance services to all active military and veterans, October 1-31 . To receive the discount, customers simply present proof of service, such as a USAA card. Details available at www.oilcanhenrys.com .
For additional information, please contact Karli Rizzo ( Karli@Turtledove.com ).
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/oil-can-henrys-supporting-military-families-300152262.html
